title: Market Research for Web 3
description: In the week leading to the Oscars, and the weeks after its groundbreaking 5 Oscar sweep for auteur Sean Baker and lead Mikey Madison, conversations about the ethics of Anora, a film that explores the complexities of sex work, divided intellectual public discourse.

milestones.title: Phase One: Test Test Test
milestones.description: As an exotic dancer working in a strip club, Anora is encouraged to create an alter-ego
